AmazonEC2.access.id
parameter.instructions: This is required in order to be able to deploy to this EC2 cloud. You can find the access id by logging into the AWS Console and going to the Security Credentials page.

parameter.description: If ANY error occurs, keep the execution running
parameter.name: General.On Error Run Forever
parameter.instructions: This value is useful to investigate the error.

parameter.name: General.keep-running
parameter.instructions:
Set the action to take in the Ready state.
This parameter doesn't apply to mutable Runs and to build image Runs.
On success is useful for deployment or long tests.
On error is useful to investigate an error if any.

parameter.name: Cloud4.access.id

parameter.name: General.Timeout
parameter.instructions: If the execution stays in a transitional state for more than the value of this timeout, the execution is forcefully terminated.
